Label: YB_ElevatorHall_HeihoMucho02
String:
Bro, let me clear something up for
you. ǴYou don't have what it takes.Ǵ
No offense.
Translation:
Bro, let me clear something up for
you. ǴYou don't have what it takes.Ǵ
No offense.

Label: YB_BackZone_Enemy03
String:
What's your deal, man? This is my
special spying spot. Find your own!
Translation:
What's your deal, man? This is my
special spying spot. Find your own!

Label: YB_ElevatorHall_Enemy06
String:
This thing looks super dangerous.  But no one's ever had any luck
against the champion with it...
Translation:
This thing looks super dangerous.  But no one's ever had any luck
against the champion with it...

Label: YB_Elevator_YesNo_Heiho00
String:
Welcome to the Battle Royal
prescreening desk. I'm here to
weed out the unqualified.  Now, this is gonna be really easy.
I'm just gonna ask you one question.
Translation:
Welcome to the Battle Royal
prescreening desk. I'm here to
weed out the unqualified.  Now, this is gonna be really easy.
I'm just gonna ask you one question.

Label: YB_BattleStage_Painky01
String: Look, Mario! There it is!
Translation: Look, Mario! There it is!

Label: YB_BossBattle_Iggy_Painky_01
String:
Mario, I'm not sure we can beat
him with the cards we have
right now...
Translation:
Mario, I'm not sure we can beat
him with the cards we have
right now...

Label: YB_Elevator_YesNo_Heiho01
String: Are you bad to the bone? (   ĬYB_Hone_YseNo01

String:

String:
NOPE!
You can't touch our chariots!
Translation:
NOPE!
You can't touch our chariots!

Label: YB_BossBattle_Iggy_Painky_02
String:
This isn't working! We have to
get out of here and regroup!
Translation:
This isn't working! We have to
get out of here and regroup!

Label: YB_Elevator_YesNo_Heiho02
String:
Now, just a minute. That may have
been confusing. Because sometimes
bad means good, right?  Let me rephrase. Would you say
you have a bone to pick with
your enemies?  Have you boned up on various
battle techniques?  Can you feel it in your bones?  You catch my drift? (   ĬYB_Hone_YseNo02
Translation:
Now, just a minute. That may have
been confusing. Because sometimes
bad means good, right?  Let me rephrase. Would you say
you have a bone to pick with
your enemies?  Have you boned up on various
battle techniques?  Can you feel it in your bones?  You catch my drift? (   ĬYB_Hone_YseNo02

Label: YB_BattleStage_Painky03
String: Come on. Let's go get it!
Translation: Come on. Let's go get it!

Label: YB_BossBattle_Iggy11
String: No fair! Where'd you get that thing?
Translation: No fair! Where'd you get that thing?

Label: YB_BossBattle_Iggy_Painky_03
String:
All right, Mario. Save your biggest
and baddest weapon for the
biggest and baddest enemy. Iggy!
Translation:
All right, Mario. Save your biggest
and baddest weapon for the
biggest and baddest enemy. Iggy!

Label: YB_Elevator_YesNo_Heiho03
String:
Oh? Is that so?  Well, no bones about it...you're
not qualified to fight.  Come back when your inventory
isn't so bare bones.  In the meantime, the spectator seats
might be a better fit for you.
Translation:
Oh? Is that so?  Well, no bones about it...you're
not qualified to fight.  Come back when your inventory
isn't so bare bones.  In the meantime, the spectator seats
might be a better fit for you.

Label: YB_BossBattle_Iggy12
String:
Now, unless you brought two of
those things...I'll just go ahead
and END THIS! Lights out, Mario!
Translation:
Now, unless you brought two of
those things...I'll just go ahead
and END THIS! Lights out, Mario!

Label: YB_BossBattle_Iggy_Painky_04
String:
Now's your chance! Show him that
you're bad to the bone!
Translation:
Now's your chance! Show him that
you're bad to the bone!

Label: YB_Elevator_YesNo_Heiho04
String:
All right! You're gonna be a real
bone cruncher out there—I just
know it.
Translation:
All right! You're gonna be a real
bone cruncher out there—I just
know it.

Label: YB_BossBattle_Iggy13
String: Come at me!
Translation: Come at me!

Label: YB_Elevator_YesNo_Heiho05
String:
Just hop on the elevator when you
want to give the Battle Royal
another shot. Good luck!
Translation:
Just hop on the elevator when you
want to give the Battle Royal
another shot. Good luck!

Label: YB_BossBattle_Iggy14
String: AHAHAHA!
Translation: AHAHAHA!

Label: YB_BossBattle_Iggy15
String:
OK, this is getting boring.
I'll put you out of my misery.
Good-bye, Mario!
Translation:
OK, this is getting boring.
I'll put you out of my misery.
Good-bye, Mario!

Label: YB_Elevator_YesNo_Heiho07
String:
The elevator is always open, if you
want to practice.
Translation:
The elevator is always open, if you
want to practice.

Label: YB_BossBattle_Iggy16
String:
A pretend bone?
OK, I'll pretend to lose!
AHAHAHA!
Translation:
A pretend bone?
OK, I'll pretend to lose!
AHAHAHA!

Label: YB_Elevator_YesNo_Heiho08
String:
Just hop on the elevator, and it'll
take you where you need to go.
Good luck out there!
Translation:
Just hop on the elevator, and it'll
take you where you need to go.
Good luck out there!

Label: YB_BattleStage_Announce02
String: AAAAAAHAHAHA!
Translation: AAAAAAHAHAHA!

Label: YB_BossBattle_Iggy08_01
String:
Let's see what you're made of,
pretty boy!
Translation:
Let's see what you're made of,
pretty boy!

Label: YB_BattleStage_Announce03
String:
Attention! The Battle Royal is
entering sudden-death overtime!
Smash it up! No holds barred!
Translation:
Attention! The Battle Royal is
entering sudden-death overtime!
Smash it up! No holds barred!

Label: YB_BossBattle_Iggy08_02
String:
Eyes on the prize, boys.
Let's show him the REAL power
of our chariots!
Translation:
Eyes on the prize, boys.
Let's show him the REAL power
of our chariots!

Label: YB_BattleStage_Announce04
String:
IT'S A MASSACRE!
Oh, it's a paintbath!  Mario the war criminal emerges
victorious!  But now it's time for the main event!
The winner takes home the yellow
Big Paint Star...  Introducing your opponent...
the master of disaster,
the spectacled spanker,
the coliseum champion...
Translation:
IT'S A MASSACRE!
Oh, it's a paintbath!  Mario the war criminal emerges
victorious!  But now it's time for the main event!
The winner takes home the yellow
Big Paint Star...  Introducing your opponent...
the master of disaster,
the spectacled spanker,
the coliseum champion...

Label: YB_BattleRoyal_01
String:
Tear him apart! Fifty coins to
whoever brings me Mario's hat!
Translation:
Tear him apart! Fifty coins to
whoever brings me Mario's hat!

Label: YB_BossBattle_Iggy08_03
String:
AHAHAHA!
I'll let my minions wreck you while I
go for a leisurely drive!
Translation:
AHAHAHA!
I'll let my minions wreck you while I
go for a leisurely drive!

Label: YB_ElevatorHall_Enemy03_02
String:
Huh. I wonder what happened to
that crazy-looking weapon that
used to be right here.
Translation:
Huh. I wonder what happened to
that crazy-looking weapon that
used to be right here.

Label: YB_BattleStage_Announce05
String: And that's it! The fight is over!
Translation: And that's it! The fight is over!

Label: YB_BattleRoyal_02
String:
Mario's still fighting!
Will he survive?
Translation:
Mario's still fighting!
Will he survive?

Label: YB_BossBattle_Iggy08_04
String:
What's the matter, Mario?
Battle Royal not going the way you
thought it would?  Well it's about to get even worse!
Line 'em up, boys!
Translation:
What's the matter, Mario?
Battle Royal not going the way you
thought it would?  Well it's about to get even worse!
Line 'em up, boys!

Label: YB_WaitingRoom2_Heiho01_01
String: Shai!
Translation: Shai!

Label: YB_BattleStage_Announce06
String:
*ahem*
Is this thing on?   Uh, today's winner is...Mario!
Translation:
*ahem*
Is this thing on?   Uh, today's winner is...Mario!

Label: YB_BattleRoyal_03
String:
AHAHAHA! Mario's taking on
ANOTHER group? YEESH!
Fight smarter, not harder!
Translation:
AHAHAHA! Mario's taking on
ANOTHER group? YEESH!
Fight smarter, not harder!

Label: YB_BossBattle_Iggy08_05
String:
JUST KIDDING!  Did you think it was over?
That you could win just like that?  AHAHAHA!
Translation:
JUST KIDDING!  Did you think it was over?
That you could win just like that?  AHAHAHA!

Label: YB_Hone_YseNo01
String:
Of course.
I...I don't know...
Translation:
Of course.
I...I don't know...

Label: YB_WaitingRoom2_Heiho01_02
String: Guyzzz!
Translation: Guyzzz!

Label: YB_BattleStage_Announce07
String:
Put your hands or equivalent
appendages together for our new
Champion!  Thanks for coming out today, folks.  As a reminder, your ticket purchase
legally obligates you to visit the gift
shop for a minimum of 25 minutes.̠
Enjoy!
Translation:
Put your hands or equivalent
appendages together for our new
Champion!  Thanks for coming out today, folks.  As a reminder, your ticket purchase
legally obligates you to visit the gift
shop for a minimum of 25 minutes.̠
Enjoy!

Label: YB_BattleRoyal_04
String:
Another battle? OK. Sure.
WHY NOT? AHAHAHA!
Translation:
Another battle? OK. Sure.
WHY NOT? AHAHAHA!

Label: YB_Hone_YseNo02
String:
Yes. Bone.
What?!
Translation:
Yes. Bone.
What?!

Label: YB_WaitingRoom2_Heiho01_03
String: Yeah!
Translation: Yeah!

Label: YB_BattleStage_Announce08
String:
Mario will be going home today with
a shiny yellow Big Paint Star!
Congrats, Mario!
Translation:
Mario will be going home today with
a shiny yellow Big Paint Star!
Congrats, Mario!

Label: YB_BattleRoyal_05
String:
All right, this is just ridiculous.
I guess we're going to be here
all day, folks.
Translation:
All right, this is just ridiculous.
I guess we're going to be here
all day, folks.

Label: YB_WaitingRoom2_ManagerHeiho01_2
String:
All right, the Shai Guyz are done.
Finished. Kaput. You got that?  I don't ever wanna hear anything
about the Shai Guyz ever again!  From now on, you're the Super
Shai Guyz. Super Shai Guyz
for life!
Translation:
All right, the Shai Guyz are done.
Finished. Kaput. You got that?  I don't ever wanna hear anything
about the Shai Guyz ever again!  From now on, you're the Super
Shai Guyz. Super Shai Guyz
for life!

Label: YB_WaitingRoom2_ManagerHeiho01_3
String:
OK, we need to rebrand. ʼAgain.  But, I spent a lot of money on
promotional stickers already, so
here's what I'm thinking.  We go with Super Fly Shai Guyz.
Then I can just get another sticker
that reads
Translation:
OK, we need to rebrand. ʼAgain.  But, I spent a lot of money on
promotional stickers already, so
here's what I'm thinking.  We go with Super Fly Shai Guyz.
Then I can just get another sticker
that reads

Label: YB_WaitingRoom2_ManagerHeiho01_4
String:
Well, the Super Fly Shai Guyz went
super bye-bye-bye.  Who's next? Who wants to be a
star? Who has another idea for
a great name?  Wait! I've got it! 2 Shy 4 U!
We're back in business, baby!
Translation:
Well, the Super Fly Shai Guyz went
super bye-bye-bye.  Who's next? Who wants to be a
star? Who has another idea for
a great name?  Wait! I've got it! 2 Shy 4 U!
We're back in business, baby!

Label: YB_Rseption_Heiho04_02
String:
I can't believe you beat Iggy. That
means you're the new champion!Ǵ
Uh...can I get your autograph?
Translation:
I can't believe you beat Iggy. That
means you're the new champion!Ǵ
Uh...can I get your autograph?

Label: YB_ElevatorHall_Enemy01_2
String:
Were those three yellow Toads in my
dressing room this whole time?!
I feel so...violated.
Translation:
Were those three yellow Toads in my
dressing room this whole time?!
I feel so...violated.

Label: YB_Reception_StandGate_Heiho01
String:
The spectator seats are being
cleaned right now.
Please come back later.  If you want to enter the competition,
you'll need to visit the registration
desk to the right.
Translation:
The spectator seats are being
cleaned right now.
Please come back later.  If you want to enter the competition,
you'll need to visit the registration
desk to the right.

Label: YB_YellowRescue02_03
String:
Wow! You wrung that out like a
washcloth! What a feat of strength!  And with that...
Translation:
Wow! You wrung that out like a
washcloth! What a feat of strength!  And with that...

Label: YB_ElevatorHall_Enemy01_3
String:
This is my dressing room, but I
actually feel more comfortable
out here in the hallway.  At least, that's what I tell myself...
Translation:
This is my dressing room, but I
actually feel more comfortable
out here in the hallway.  At least, that's what I tell myself...

Label: YB_Reception_StandGate_Heiho02
String:
The spectator seats are this way.Ǵ
Watch your step, though—lotta
disgruntled losers in there.
Translation:
The spectator seats are this way.Ǵ
Watch your step, though—lotta
disgruntled losers in there.

Label: YB_YellowRescue02_04
String:
Yellow Rescue Toads 2, 3, and 4...
Over and out!
Translation:
Yellow Rescue Toads 2, 3, and 4...
Over and out!

Label: YB_BattleStage_Painky02_2
String:
Hold it! We're getting nowhere like
this. There's got to be a better way!  Maybe there's some way to take
them all out at once... Let's take
a look around this place!
Translation:
Hold it! We're getting nowhere like
this. There's got to be a better way!  Maybe there's some way to take
them all out at once... Let's take
a look around this place!

Label: YB_BattleStage_Iggy01
String:
AHAHAHA!
You should see the look on your
face!  No, really.
Can we get a mirror over here?  Ah, forget it...̠
Let's shred this paper pusher!
Translation:
AHAHAHA!
You should see the look on your
face!  No, really.
Can we get a mirror over here?  Ah, forget it...̠
Let's shred this paper pusher!

Label: YB_Rseption_Painky10
String:
What's he screaming about?
Let's check in at that window over
there before heading inside.
Translation:
What's he screaming about?
Let's check in at that window over
there before heading inside.

Label: YB_BattleStage_Iggy02
String:
Well, well, well...look who's back!
C'mon, Mario! No more running
from this fight!
Translation:
Well, well, well...look who's back!
C'mon, Mario! No more running
from this fight!

Label: YB_Rseption_Painky11
String:
Awfully dark in here, isn't it?
They're really setting the stage!  I can't wait to get medieval and
crush my foes in a Battle Royal!  I mean...I can't wait to watch you
do those things.
Translation:
Awfully dark in here, isn't it?
They're really setting the stage!  I can't wait to get medieval and
crush my foes in a Battle Royal!  I mean...I can't wait to watch you
do those things.

Label: YB_BattleStage_Iggy03
String:
UGH! I lost on my home turf?
That's embarrassing...  Well, I guess you can take the
Big Paint Star now...  Shut it down! Show's over!
Translation:
UGH! I lost on my home turf?
That's embarrassing...  Well, I guess you can take the
Big Paint Star now...  Shut it down! Show's over!

Label: YB_Rseption_Heiho01
String:
Ahem. Sorry, what I meant to
say was...  The Golden Coliseum is currently
in the middle of a Battle Royal.  I just got caught up in the drama
of it all.  Anyway, if you come back later, you
can fight battles and win fabulous
prizes. Such as...  A Big Paint Star!
Translation:
Ahem. Sorry, what I meant to
say was...  The Golden Coliseum is currently
in the middle of a Battle Royal.  I just got caught up in the drama
of it all.  Anyway, if you come back later, you
can fight battles and win fabulous
prizes. Such as...  A Big Paint Star!

Label: YB_BattleStage_Announce05_2
String:
Mario wins the Battle Royal!ʼ
The crowd goes wild!
Translation:
Mario wins the Battle Royal!ʼ
The crowd goes wild!

Label: YB_Rseption_Heiho02
String:
Mario?   Did that paint can just call
you Mario, Mario?
Translation:
Mario?   Did that paint can just call
you Mario, Mario?

Label: YB_Rseption_Heiho03
String:
Please enter through the door to
your right and stop by the pre-
screening desk. Good luck!
Translation:
Please enter through the door to
your right and stop by the pre-
screening desk. Good luck!

Label: YB_Rseption_Heiho04
String:
Please enter through the door to
your right and stop by the pre-
screening desk. Good luck!
Translation:
Please enter through the door to
your right and stop by the pre-
screening desk. Good luck!

Label: YB_Rseption_Heiho05
String:
Welcome to the Golden Coliseum.  Our Battle Royal just concluded,
but you're welcome to visit the
arena, if you'd like to practice.
Translation:
Welcome to the Golden Coliseum.  Our Battle Royal just concluded,
but you're welcome to visit the
arena, if you'd like to practice.

Label: YB_Rseption_Heiho06
String:
Sorry, the Battle Royal is over.
You're welcome to visit the arena if
you'd like to practice.
Translation:
Sorry, the Battle Royal is over.
You're welcome to visit the arena if
you'd like to practice.

Label: YB_Rseption_Heiho07
String:
Just as I thought!  You've already been preregistered
for the next Battle Royal!
Translation:
Just as I thought!  You've already been preregistered
for the next Battle Royal!

Label: YB_Concourse_Painky01
String:
Whoa, we made it to the outer
wall! Check out the view!
Translation:
Whoa, we made it to the outer
wall! Check out the view!

Label: YB_Concourse_Painky02
String: Ooh, ninja-style. I like it.
Translation: Ooh, ninja-style. I like it.

Label: YB_BossBattle_Iggy05_01
String:
AHAHAHA! These chariots were
such a good investment.
Translation:
AHAHAHA! These chariots were
such a good investment.

Label: YB_BossBattle_Iggy01
String:
So anyway, I'm Iggy!
I'll be your frustratingly overpowered
opponent today!
Translation:
So anyway, I'm Iggy!
I'll be your frustratingly overpowered
opponent today!

Label: YB_BossBattle_Iggy05_03
String:
DENIED!
You can't touch our chariots!
Translation:
DENIED!
You can't touch our chariots!

Label: YB_ReceptionDesk_Enemy01
String:
You can take the stairs to get to
the upper deck.  Just watch out for the folks who
already washed out of the battle.
They're not happy about it.
Translation:
You can take the stairs to get to
the upper deck.  Just watch out for the folks who
already washed out of the battle.
They're not happy about it.

Label: YB_Concourse_Enemy02_01
String:
I heard they're still waiting
for the sacrificial lamb. Heh...  Supposed to be some guy named
Mario. Never heard of him.
Translation:
I heard they're still waiting
for the sacrificial lamb. Heh...  Supposed to be some guy named
Mario. Never heard of him.

Label: YB_Concourse_Enemy02_02
String:
Man, Iggy was kind of a terrible
champion, wasn't he?
Translation:
Man, Iggy was kind of a terrible
champion, wasn't he?

Label: YB_Concourse_Enemy02_03
String:
That Chain Chomp was off the
chain, though! Literally!
Translation:
That Chain Chomp was off the
chain, though! Literally!

Label: YB_BossBattle_Iggy07
String:
AW MAN! The sales guy told me
those chariots were invincible!
I want a refund!
Translation:
AW MAN! The sales guy told me
those chariots were invincible!
I want a refund!

Label: YB_BattleRoyal_BBHeiho01
String:
Put your hands together for
everyone's favorite battling boy
band...the Shai Guyz!
Translation:
Put your hands together for
everyone's favorite battling boy
band...the Shai Guyz!

Label: YB_BossBattle_Iggy09
String:
OK, so you're not a COMPLETE
waste of paint.
Translation:
OK, so you're not a COMPLETE
waste of paint.

Label: YB_ElevatorHall_Heiho01
String:
*sniff*̠
You reek of self-confidence.̠
And you have a face.̠
You'd make a terrible Shy Guy.
Translation:
*sniff*̠
You reek of self-confidence.̠
And you have a face.̠
You'd make a terrible Shy Guy.

Label: YB_BackZone_Enemy03_2
String:
Shh! I'm spying on these guys to
get a few tips for my next battle.
You want in?
Translation:
Shh! I'm spying on these guys to
get a few tips for my next battle.
You want in?

Label: YB_Concourse_Enemy01
String:
This is the third floor.
Nosebleed section.
Translation:
This is the third floor.
Nosebleed section.

Label: YB_Concourse_Enemy02
String:
Didja hear? The winner of the big
Battle Royal is gettin' some fancy
star thing!
Translation:
Didja hear? The winner of the big
Battle Royal is gettin' some fancy
star thing!

Label: YB_Concourse_Enemy03
String:
We're just simple country Goombas,
here to watch some family-friendly
paintshed.
Translation:
We're just simple country Goombas,
here to watch some family-friendly
paintshed.

Label: YB_YellowRescue_First01
String:
Hello, Mario.
We have something for you.  We received a report that one of
the precious fossils from Marmalade
Valley was stolen.  Using sophisticated Toad treasure-
tracking technology, we tracked it
here.
Translation:
Hello, Mario.
We have something for you.  We received a report that one of
the precious fossils from Marmalade
Valley was stolen.  Using sophisticated Toad treasure-
tracking technology, we tracked it
here.

Label: YB_Concourse_Enemy04
String:
You couldn't get me in that ring.
Nope. When it's my time to go, I
want to go out with dignity.  Getting stomped by Mario or
Luigi, of course.
Translation:
You couldn't get me in that ring.
Nope. When it's my time to go, I
want to go out with dignity.  Getting stomped by Mario or
Luigi, of course.

Label: YB_WaitingRoom1_Heiho01
String:
This is so weird. I definitely left
it RIGHT HERE.
Translation:
This is so weird. I definitely left
it RIGHT HERE.

Label: YB_YellowRescue_First02
String:
They were keeping it in the storage
room, and they even locked the
door. Clever. VERY clever.  But you have to get up pretty early
in the morning to outwit the yellow
Rescue Squad!  We reached in the back window
and stole it back!
Translation:
They were keeping it in the storage
room, and they even locked the
door. Clever. VERY clever.  But you have to get up pretty early
in the morning to outwit the yellow
Rescue Squad!  We reached in the back window
and stole it back!

Label: YB_Concourse_Enemy05
String:
Mario, you sure did stomp that Iggy
fellow good! Heck, we'd be honored
to get stomped by you anytime!
Translation:
Mario, you sure did stomp that Iggy
fellow good! Heck, we'd be honored
to get stomped by you anytime!

Label: YB_WaitingRoom1_Heiho02
String:
How could you lose it? Do you even
know how annoying it was for me
to go to Marmalade Valley to steal
it in the first place?!
Translation:
How could you lose it? Do you even
know how annoying it was for me
to go to Marmalade Valley to steal
it in the first place?!

Label: YB_YellowRescue_First03
String:
The thieves kept talking about how
they needed this for the Battle
Royal for some reason.  I don't get it, though. How could
someone even LIFT this thing, let
alone use it in battle?
Translation:
The thieves kept talking about how
they needed this for the Battle
Royal for some reason.  I don't get it, though. How could
someone even LIFT this thing, let
alone use it in battle?

Label: YB_WaitingRoom1_Heiho03
String:
Man, it was JUST here. It's gotta
be in the Coliseum somewhere...
Translation:
Man, it was JUST here. It's gotta
be in the Coliseum somewhere...

Label: YB_YellowRescue_First04
String:
I'm just glad we met you here so
we didn't have to lug this giant
thing anywhere!  We're not moving it another inch, so
consider this place its permanent
home now.
Translation:
I'm just glad we met you here so
we didn't have to lug this giant
thing anywhere!  We're not moving it another inch, so
consider this place its permanent
home now.

Label: YB_ElevatorHall_Enemy02_1
String:
I just know I could win the Battle
Royal if I had the right weapon...  Aw, who am I kidding? I never make
it past the entry quiz.
Translation:
I just know I could win the Battle
Royal if I had the right weapon...  Aw, who am I kidding? I never make
it past the entry quiz.

Label: YB_Rseption_Painky01
String:
Did he say we could win a Big Paint
Star? ǴLemme at 'em! I'll win the
Battle Royal fair and square!  Or, maybe you could win it. Since
you're the heroic type and all, Mario.
Translation:
Did he say we could win a Big Paint
Star? ǴLemme at 'em! I'll win the
Battle Royal fair and square!  Or, maybe you could win it. Since
you're the heroic type and all, Mario.

String: Stands - 3rd Level

Label: YB_ElevatorHall_Enemy02_2
String:
Man, weapons are so sweet.
I wish I had one of my own...
Translation:
Man, weapons are so sweet.
I wish I had one of my own...

Label: YB_Rseption_Painky02
String:
Really? Well, who would have been
so kind as to preregister us?  Because we've never been here
before, you know.   I guess that's just another perk
of being famous, huh, Mario?
Translation:
Really? Well, who would have been
so kind as to preregister us?  Because we've never been here
before, you know.   I guess that's just another perk
of being famous, huh, Mario?

Label: YB_WaitingRoom3_Heiho01
String:
So then the guy turns around and
starts running, right? And I can just
tell, he's shaking in his boots!  The champ is circling in, and this
guy isn't even looking at him!
He's looking at the ground!  Next thing you know, he turns
around, sprints under the champ's
legs, and runs to the back wall!
Translation:
So then the guy turns around and
starts running, right? And I can just
tell, he's shaking in his boots!  The champ is circling in, and this
guy isn't even looking at him!
He's looking at the ground!  Next thing you know, he turns
around, sprints under the champ's
legs, and runs to the back wall!

Label: YB_WaitingRoom3_Heiho02
String: No way!
Translation: No way!

My guys are pumped and ready
to fight. Just look at 'em!  I want you cheering as hard as
you can for the Shai Guyz. Got it?

Label: YB_ElevatorHall_Enemy06_02
String:

against me in battle!
Translation:
There was a really sharp weapon
right here. I hope no one uses it
against me in battle!

Label: YB_Elevator_YesNo_Heiho05_02
String:
You really ARE bad to the bone.
And that bone was VERY bad to
Iggy. Color me impressed.
Translation:
You really ARE bad to the bone.
And that bone was VERY bad to
Iggy. Color me impressed.

Label: YB_Rseption_Heiho10
String:   Battle! ǴROYAAAAAL!
Translation:   Battle! ǴROYAAAAAL!

Label: YB_BackZone_WaitingRoom3_Heiho01
String:
...And you'll never guess what
happened when he got to the
back wall.  He started attacking boxes like
they were enemies or something!  Like, was he looking for something?
What's in the boxes? No one knows!
Translation:
...And you'll never guess what
happened when he got to the
back wall.  He started attacking boxes like
they were enemies or something!  Like, was he looking for something?
What's in the boxes? No one knows!

Label: YB_BackZone_WaitingRoom3_Heiho02
String: Bahaha!
Translation: Bahaha!

Label: YB_YellowRescue_First01_2
String:
And here it is!  I was told that you'd be quite
pleased with this result.  So, don't hold back.
You can give me a hug, if you like.  Or, hug the bone, if you prefer.
I was told that's a thing you
might do as well.
Translation:
And here it is!  I was told that you'd be quite
pleased with this result.  So, don't hold back.
You can give me a hug, if you like.  Or, hug the bone, if you prefer.
I was told that's a thing you
might do as well.

Label: YB_BackZone_WaitingRoom3_Heiho03
String: Talk about losing your cool!
Translation: Talk about losing your cool!

Ooh...Mario's down to his final
opponent. This is what we've
all been waiting for!
Translation:
Ooh...Mario's down to his final
opponent. This is what we've
all been waiting for!

Label: YB_Elevator_YesNo_Heiho08_2

Just hop on the elevator when
you're ready to throw down in the
Battle Royal! Good luck!
Translation:
Just hop on the elevator when
you're ready to throw down in the
Battle Royal! Good luck!

Label: YB_BackZone_WaitingRoom3_Heiho04
String:
Hey! I really wanted to know what
was in those boxes, OK?
Translation:
Hey! I really wanted to know what
was in those boxes, OK?

Label: YB_BattleStage_Announce02_2
String:
He fell for it! I've really painted
you into a corner now, Mario!  Welcome to the Battle Royal—
the last fight of your life!
Translation:
He fell for it! I've really painted
you into a corner now, Mario!  Welcome to the Battle Royal—
the last fight of your life!

String:

locked out right now.  Good sign before my big fight, right?
Translation:

locked out right now.  Good sign before my big fight, right?

Translation: I wonder how you use this one?

Translation:

but I just don't know if I've got
